00060 /*
00061 ** Defines
00062 */
00063 #define CFE_SB_POLL                     0      
00064 #define CFE_SB_PEND_FOREVER            -1      
00065 #define CFE_SB_SUB_ENTRIES_PER_PKT      20     
00066 #define CFE_SB_SUBSCRIPTION             0      
00067 #define CFE_SB_UNSUBSCRIPTION           1      
00069 /*
00070 ** Macro Definitions
00071 */
00072 #define CFE_BIT(x)   (1 << (x))               
00073 #define CFE_SET(i,x) ((i) |= CFE_BIT(x))      
00074 #define CFE_CLR(i,x) ((i) &= ~CFE_BIT(x))     
00075 #define CFE_TST(i,x) (((i) & CFE_BIT(x)) != 0)
